title: Is it okay for a civil engineer (fresher) to join as supervisor in a construction company? - Quora

response.answer_text: Friends go ahead and join, it is perfectly fine. This is where every fresher struck in their careers and ruin their life. It is the experience what you gain matters rather than a designation. It is myth that you stay as a supervisor entire your life if you started career as a supervisor. Join the company learn and gain experience. May be after one or two years start applying for jobs and you will land in an excellent job. Think in another way, how long will you depend on your parents? Your father is becoming older. Your mother wants you to be in good offices. Moreover, the world respects your career path as you reach the top positions. Everyone who works at site are supervisors. They supervise and oversee the work in terms of quality, safety and productivity. One of the role of a Manager or Engineer is to supervise her/his team members. Love your job and not the designation. Enjoy the work that makes you happy and not busy! Good Luck! Pa1

Dont do that… See as a Engineer Everyone have some kind of knowledge in their own field. As a fresher its difficult to get platform to show their skills. so be patience and try to get in to any construction firm at least as a Junior Site engineer .( not supervisor). Why not Supervisor means, As a technical Student your willing to do as a Supervisor means , it shows your Strength of knowledge, confidence, mind set etc.. It will going to be a major draw back for your resume and future Interviews also. So be patience and just try and try. One day You will get what you want… (Remember every engineer will start his career as a Fresher only) All the best bro…
